00047 template<unsigned DIM>
00048 class VolumeConstraintPottsUpdateRule : public AbstractPottsUpdateRule<DIM>
00049 {
00050 friend class TestPottsUpdateRules;
00051 
00052 private:
00053 
00059     double mDeformationEnergyParameter;
00060 
00066     double mMatureCellTargetVolume;
00067 
00068     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00069     template<class Archive>
00070     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00071     {
00072         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractPottsUpdateRule<DIM> >(*this);
00073         archive & mDeformationEnergyParameter;
00074         archive & mMatureCellTargetVolume;
00075     }
00076 
00077 public:
00078 
00082     VolumeConstraintPottsUpdateRule();
00083 
00087     ~VolumeConstraintPottsUpdateRule();
00088 
00101     double EvaluateHamiltonianContribution(unsigned currentNodeIndex,
00102                                            unsigned targetNodeIndex,
00103                                            PottsBasedCellPopulation<DIM>& rCellPopulation);
00104 
00108     double GetDeformationEnergyParameter();
00109 
00115     void SetDeformationEnergyParameter(double deformationEnergyParameter);
00116 
00120     double GetMatureCellTargetVolume() const;
00121 
00127     void SetMatureCellTargetVolume(double matureCellTargetVolume);
00128 
00134     void OutputUpdateRuleParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile);
00135 };
